Class PostFragment

java.lang.Object

      ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.fragments.PostFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class PostFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment

Responsible for the UI fragment that allows a user to post a new thread.

Author:
Artem Chikin
